RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 70000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY PERFECT MISTAKE broke in at the start brushing with TROUBLED LUCK and forcing TOUR JETE to steady in behind, raced seven paths off the inside in aim of the duel up front, tucked three wide into the turn and advanced to vie for command outside a pair of rivals patiently handled until set down swinging four wide into upper stretch, seized sole command straightened away, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole and held clear to the finish. TOUR JETE lost her footing at the start getting away awkwardly then got forced to be steadied as rivals on each side broke her way to fill the vacancy, conceded six to seven lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased just off the inside down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled out six to seven wide into upper stretch and showed good courage to offer up a mild kick closing in to secure the place honors. TROUBLED LUCK broke out at the start brushing with MY PERFECT MISTAKE and forcing the aforementioned foe to steady in behind, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued along the inside into upper stretch before tipping out three to four wide near the eighth pole, then offered up a mild bid to procure the show honors. LA INDECENTE coaxed from the gate, dueled from the four path with MYSARIA to the outside, tucked inside into the turn and vied inside a pair of rivals coming under coaxing midway, took the inside route into upper stretch under threat, yielded the front straightened away and weakened in the final furlong. MYSARIA coaxed from the start, dueled from the five path to the outside of LA INDECENTE, tucked to the two path and vied now between foes when joined by the eventual winner to the outside, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. ORGANA SOLO chased eight paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside briefly half a mile from home before getting out a bit green three wide once in the turn, came under coaxing just off the inside three furlongs out, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: La Indecente
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 4p, vied ins turn, ins 1/4, yielded, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Mysaria
ENTRY.OWNER: Tee N Jay Stable and Hills, Timothy A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 5p, vied 2p betw turn, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Troubled Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 6w backstretch, to ins 1/2, inside 1/4, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Tour Jete
ENTRY.OWNER: Team Penney Racing and Carem Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward, steadied st, chased 2p, 6-7w upper, good courage

ENTRY.NAME: My Perfect Mistake
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 7w in aim, vied 3w turn, 4w uppr, up, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Organa Solo
ENTRY.COMMENT: 8w backstretch, to ins 1/2, coaxed 2p 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 39000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUE ELLEN MISHKIN went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, was asked under threat in the two path on the turn, lost the advantage into upper stretch, fought back gamely in the final furlong, regained the advantage in the final sixteenth and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. DIVA BANKER was coaxed along on the outside, chased in the four path on the turn, turned into upper stretch under the crop, pursued the leading duo while outside into the final furlong, gained to make a bid in the final sixteenth and just missed. SLACK TIDE showed early speed then dropped back near the nine-sixteenths and tracked the pace, made a bid in the three path midway through the turn, took a short lead into upper stretch, battled outside the winner into the final furlong, drifted out near the sixteenth-pole, fought with the top two to the finish and also just missed. JACKIE THE JOKER bobbled after the start, was rated off the pace, drafted inside to the two path on the turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, chased the top three wide while remaining on her inside lead into the final furlong then swapped to the proper lead, steadied while altering out behind horses late and finished willingly. ITS COLD IN DEHERE threw her head at the start and was off slow, climbed under urging early, went two then three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch then moved out a path further and gained late but failed to seriously threaten. TRADE SECRET was fractious in the gate, dropped back under urging, went three then four wide on the turn and was no factor. DIVA BANKER RAN FOR PURSE-MONEY ONLY

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R and Scuderi Vincent S
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed outside,chased 4p turn,gained late,bid,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Slack Tide
ENTRY.COMMENT: drop back 4-1/2,tracked,bid 3path trn,led3/16-1/16,drift out,miss

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie the Joker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled aftr brk,rated,ins-2p turn,chased,stdied late,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Trade Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,urged along,drop back,3-4w turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Sue Ellen Mishkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,asked 2path turn,headed3/16,fought back gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Its Cold in Dehere
ENTRY.COMMENT: threw head,off slw,climbd early,2-3p turn,5w1/4,6w3/16,late gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Claiming Purse 45000. (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BADLANDS RULER hustled from the gate, showed the way in hand three then two wide under pressure from REMEMBER THE NAME to the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, inched away briefly a furlong out, dug in under threat and held gamely to prevail. REMEMBER THE NAME prompted the leader from the outside three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive getting shaken off briefly before coming again inside the eighth pole but was ultimately repelled while well clear of the rest and along second best. MY MAN WOODY broke in at the start, chased four wide down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. THUNDERSLAM broke in at the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and weakened. PICCATA PRINCE broke in at the start pinching back MAX S and bumping QUICKER THAN QUICK solidly sideways, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch before going three to four wide through the turn, swung five wide into upper stretch and tired. QUICKER THAN QUICK got bumped solidly at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. MAX S got pinched back between foes at the start, chased five wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, went six wide at the head of the stretch and was unable to make an impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Badlands Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, in hand 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Quicker Than Quick
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped solidly st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Max S
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan Carney Christopher L and Abraham Samuel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Piccata Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 6w early, 4-3w turn, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Thunderslam
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Woody
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 4w pursuit, to ins turn, 2w 1/4p, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Remember the Name
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3w, coaxed near 1/4, 5w uppr, dug in, repelled, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 55000. (UP TO $9,570 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or O ver In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TENEBRIS was taken in hand early then stalked the pace on the inside of a rival, moved up to get the lead at the nine-sixteenths, vied in the two path on the turn, was asked outside the quarter-pole, shook off foes into the final furlong, drifted out near the sixteenth-pole and just held under strong urging. STJAMES came away a bit awkwardly and was slow into stride, raced at the rear under urging, moved from the two path to the four path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and finished fast to just miss. KANT BEAT THE ROCK was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the four path on the turn, made a bid outside of two rivals in upper stretch, dropped back some into the final furlong, kept on well to the finish and willingly earned the show. ANTHRACITE was taken under light restraint then rated in a good position down the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path, was given his cue near the five-sixteenths, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response. DUKE OF GLOUCESTER was taken in hand early, moved up to prompt the pace leaving the chute, vied in the three path on the turn, was roused near the five-sixteenths, dropped back into the final furlong and tired. PETROLO stumbled in the hindquarters at the start and was off slow, spotted the front a few lengths, moved in towards the rear, raced inside for most of the turn then shifted to the two path, came out into upper stretch and was no factor. PINE VALLEY angled in while going to the front, led the way to the nine-sixteenths then lost the advantage, dropped back under urging while inside on the turn and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Stjames
ENTRY.OWNER: Gyarmati Leah Brooklyn Racing Co and Windborne Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride,urged along,2-4p turn,5p1/4,rallied,closed fast

ENTRY.NAME: Anthracite
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated,good position,2p turn,asked5/16,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Tenebris
ENTRY.OWNER: Proud Stable Inc and Preve Dominguez Camilo
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,stalkd ins foe,lead4-1/2,2p-ins trn,ask1/4,drift1/16,held

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Gloucester
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,mvd up 6-1/2,prompt outside,3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Petrolo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled behind brk,off slow,mvd in,ins-2p,came out1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Kant Beat the Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,tracked outside,chased 4p turn,bid3/16,kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Pine Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,pace,headed 4-1/2,drop back rail turn,faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Claiming Purse 36000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCREW LOOSE vied briefly with a pair before showing the way in hand three then two wide, swung three wide into upper stretch, got let out with three-sixteenths to go and went clear under a drive drifting out despite a right handed crop to the finish. PRACTICAL MISS chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide for home, proved no match for the top one, kept on to hold on for the place honors. SIN NOMBRE stumbled at the start, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and improved position to procure the show honors. ACADEMY CHOICE coaxed from the gate, led briefly when vying between foes early on, then chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide for home, weakened in the stretch. THATSMYBOXER coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened. WAR PRINCE coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide under a ride from three furlongs out, swung six wide into upper stretch, weakened. TESTA DURA chased four then five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went eight wide at the head of the stretch, tired. MAJESTIC ARC chased along the inside and then just off the inside and was placed in tight and taken in hand off the heels of rivals nearing five and a half furlongs to run, clipped the back of a rival and bobbled at that station losing two to three lengths of ground, chased just off the inside through the turn and into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Sin Nombre
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 5w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Testa Dura
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 3/8, 8w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Arc
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, clip heels, bobbled 5 1/2, 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Practical Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, no match, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: War Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Academy Choice
ENTRY.OWNER: McMahon Michael J Windways Farm Long Eric Y Sedgwick Farm Begg James Bentley Cop
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led briefly, chased 2p, ins turn, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Screw Loose
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-2w, 3w upper, let out 3/16, drifted out, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Thatsmyboxer
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KENTUCKY JOKER settled towards the rear, went two then three wide on the turn, followed the runner-up while rallying into the final furlong, moved out outside the sixteenth-pole and closed fast go get up late. GOOD REUNION brushed with a foe while off a step slow, moved up on the outside under urging, dropped from the five path to the three path early on the turn, remained in the three path into the stretch, rallied strongly to get the lead outside the sixteenth-pole but was denied while clear for the place. THE MIGHTY DON moved up near the nine-sixteenths to make a bid on the outside, vied in the two to three path on the turn, took the lead outside the quarter-pole, led under a drive into the final furlong then was collared by the runner-up and weakened but just held the show. WOODSIDE WARRIOR broke a step slow, was urged at the rear, went three wide on the turn, came six wide into upper stretch and improved position. SHARPAZ was hustled clear early then challenged to his outside near the nine-sixteenths, vied inside to the two path on the turn, lost the advantage outside the quarter-pole, fought under a drive into the final furlong and tired. BUSTINO SANTINO brushed with an opponent while off a step slow, moved up to be forwardly placed on the outside, chased three to four wide on the turn, spun five wide into upper stretch and capitulated. SOMAMA BEACH made light contact with a foe at the start, jostled with that same rival early, was rated off the pace, went around the turn in the two path while let out and came up empty. NOBILIS bumped lightly with a rival at the start then was hustled hard, jostled with that same foe early, went three then four wide on the turn and failed to respond. VAUNTED was well placed on the inside, came under urging on the turn, took a few awkward strides into the kickback outside the quarter-pole and dropped out.

ENTRY.NAME: Vaunted
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,asked rail turn,awkward stride outside 1/4,drop out

ENTRY.NAME: Sharpaz
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Koshanostra Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,clear early,challenged 4-1/2,ins-2p turn,headed1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Woodside Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,urged at rear,3p turn,6p into upper,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Kentucky Joker
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Linda and Italian Stallions Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,2-3path turn,rallied final 1/8,mvd out 1/16,closd fast,up

ENTRY.NAME: Nobilis
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,hustled,jostled,urged,3-4wide turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Somama Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,jostled early,rated,let out 2p turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: The Mighty Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd up,bid 4-1/2,out,2-3p turn,lead1/4,collared out1/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Good Reunion
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,step slow,urged out,mvd up,5-3p turn,raliled,led,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Bustino Santino
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,step slow,outside,chased 3-4p turn,5p3/16,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 75000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BE THE BOSS chased along the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn patiently handled, swung four then three wide into upper stretch and seized command set down straightened away, drew clear under a drive and was geared down in the late stages. LOCKE AND KEY chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one, ran on to secure the place honors. FAST BUCK FREDDY chased three to four wide down the backstretch and then four to five wide through the turn coaxed along from the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch and improved position to procure the show honors. SINFUL DANCER chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. G MUNNING lunged through the gate as the latch was sprung, dueled inside of ONE WHIRLWIND RIDE from the get go coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. ONE WHIRLWIND RIDE dueled three then two wide with G MUNNING to his inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch continuing to knock heads and was overhauled by the eventual winner straightened away, then weakened to the finish. MY LAST MISSION chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened. TWO FOR CHARGING coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coaxed along from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Be the Boss
ENTRY.OWNER: Nice Guys Stables Oringer Jay Al Bianchi Racing LLC and Hornstock Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins early, 3w turn, 4-3w uppr, up, drew clear, geared down

ENTRY.NAME: Two for Charging
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, angled 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Locke and Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: G Munning
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged st, dueled ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: My Last Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Buck Freddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 4-5w 5/16, 6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Sinful Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: One Whirlwind Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, yielded, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 8 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 80000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNINGWSCISSORS was fractious in the gate then broke a step slow, angled in at the rear, was reserved on the inside, swung four wide into the stretch, rallied outside to make a bid near the furlong marker, fought with two foes to the sixteenth-pole and prevailed under strong handling. ITSALLCOMINTOGETHA prompted the pace on the outside in the two path, took the lead at the five-sixteenths, led under a drive into the final furlong then was headed by the winner and was outfinished while just able to get the place. AGENT CREED was hustled from the gate, saved ground on the first turn, was well placed while rated off the pace, moved from the rail to the two path under urging on the far turn, was driven three wide into the stretch, gained to make a bid between horses near the furlong marker but was also outfinished then just missed the place but earned the show. BORN DANCER broke through the front of the gate prior to the start but remained in the stall, came away awkwardly but with the field, was taken back then moved in early, went around the opening bend in the two path, was unhurried near the back, saved ground on the far turn, moved out into upper stretch and improved position. LET'S GO BIG BLUE went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused while moving from three to five wide on the far turn, came six wide into upper stretch, moved in while in a reasonable striking position into the final furlong but lacked the needed kick. CITIZEN K was hustled to the front, showed the way on the inside while inside of a foe, lost the lead while asked at the five-sixteenths and gave way. KING OF COMEDY dropped back between horses nearing the first turn, went three wide on that bend, settled off the pace, went three then four wide on the far turn and failed to rally. CURLY LARRY AND MO traveled four wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside without cover, was urged three wide on the far turn and came up empty. STEELERSFANFORLIFE went around the first turn in the two path, was reserved off the pace, went two to three wide on the far turn, dropped to the rail nearing the quarter-pole and failed to respond. ROUGH DRAFT went three wide on the first turn, stalked the pace, came up empty in the two path on the far turn and dropped out.

ENTRY.NAME: Steelersfanforlife
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,reserved,2-3p2nd turn,mvd in 1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Citizen K
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,inside foe,headed5/16,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Agent Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well placed ins-2path,3w1/4,bid btwn1/8,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Itsallcomintogetha
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted out 2p,lead5/16,headed ins1/8,outfinished,held2nd

ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Big Toe Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,stalked,empty 2p2nd turn,dropped out

ENTRY.NAME: King of Comedy
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David Maxis Stable and Gardella Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back btwn,3w1st,settled,3-4w2nd turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Runningwscissors
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,step slow,reserved ins,swung 4w1/4,rallied,up

ENTRY.NAME: Born Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke open gate,awkward st,tkn back,2p-ins,mvd out3/16,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Curly Larry and Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st,tracked outside,urged 3w2nd turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Big Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,roused 3-5w2nd turn,6w3/16,no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCE WITH ME BABE coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch taking over command, edged clear under a drive to prevail. MO DAMORNINGGROUCH showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch and yielded the front straightened away, then ran on to preserve the place honors safely on the wire. FOLLOW THE FED chased five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. UNHOLY broke out at the start under coaxing, chased two to three wide under a ride from the five-sixteenths, continued two to three wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. BOSTON STRONG MAMA chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, weakened. DEBBIE DARLING chased two to three wide coaxed along from the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, made no impact. GALATRONA broke out at the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five to six wide into upper stretch and tired. DREAMING OF CARLI coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under a ride three furlongs from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. ISLAND ROSE chased two to three wide until tucked inside through the turn, grew detached at the tail of the field, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Damorninggrouch
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, collared, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Debbie Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 8w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dance With Me Babe
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed near 1/4, 4w upper, up, edged clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Island Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Unholy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Lion Thoroughbreds and Skelly Matthew S
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w uppr, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Galatrona
